Translations.Text: Yasina
Sapatha ahe bud'dhi-kausalyayukta (ani majabuta) kura'anaci
Ki niscitaca tumhi paigambarampaiki ahata
Sarala margavara ahata
(Ha kura'ana, allaha) jabaradasta, mothya daya karanaryatarphe avatarita kela gela ahe
Yasathi ki tumhi asa lokanna khabaradara karave, jyancya vadavadilanna khabaradara kele gele navhate. Yastava te gaphalatita padale aheta
Tyancyapaiki adhikansa lokambabata hi gosta sabita jhali ahe. Yastava he loka imana rakhanara nahita
Amhi tyancya mananvara tauka (jokhanda) takale ahe, je tyancya hanuvatiparyanta ahe, jyamule tyanci doki vara uthalelya sthitita aheta
Ani amhi eka ada tyancyasamora ubha kela ani eka ada tyancya mage ubha kela, jyadvare amhi tyanna jhakuna takale, tevha te pahu sakata nahi
Ani tyancya sandarbhata tumace bhaya dakhavine kinva na dakhavine donhi sarakheca ahe. He imana balaganara nahita

Tumhi kevala asaca manasala bhaya dakhavu sakata, jo upadesace anusarana karila ani rahamana (allaha) ce na pahata bhaya balagela, tevha tumhi asa manasala ksama ani uttama mobadala dila janyaci khusakhabara aikava

Nihsansaya, amhi mrtanna jivanta karu ani amhi lihita asato je karma dekhila loka pudhe pathavitata ani tyanci ti karmehi, ji te mage soduna jatata ani pratyeka gostisa amhi eka spasta granthata sankalita karuna thevale ahe
Ani tumhi tyancyasamora eka udaharana (arthata eka) vastivalyanca kis'sa (tya kalaca) sadara kara, jevha tya vastita aneka rasula ale
Jevha amhi tyancyajavala dona rasula pathavileta, tevha tya lokanni (prathama) tya doghanna samarthana dile, tevha te tighe mhanale, amhi tumacyakade (paigambara banavuna) pathavilo gelo ahota
Te loka mhanale, tumhi tara amacyasarakheca sadharana manusya ahata ani rahamana (dayavana) ne konatihi gosta avatarita keli nahi. Tumhi kevala khote bolata
Te rasula mhanale, amaca palanakarta janato ki amhala tumacyakade rasula banavuna pathavile gele ahe
Ani amace kartavya tara kevala spastapane pohacavine evadheca ahe
Te mhanale ki amhi tara tumhala abhadra samajato ani jara tumhi he thambavile nahi tara amhi tumhala dagadanni thecuna tumace kamaca tamama karuna taku ani tumhala amacyatarphe sakta siksa milela
Te paigambara mhanale ki tumaci abhadrata tara tumacya sobatila ahe, kaya tila (asubha samajata) ki tumhala sikavana dili javi, kimbahuna tumhi tara maryadece ullanghana karanare loka ahata
Ani eka musya tya saharacya sevatacya kinaryakaduna dhavata ala, to mhanala, he majhya janasamuhacya lokanno! Ya paigambarancya margace anusarana kara
Asa lokancya margace anusarana kara, je tumacyakaduna kasalahi mobadala magata nahita ani te satya - margavara aheta
Ani mala kaya jhale ahe ki mi tyaci upasana na karavi, jyane mala nirmana kele ani tumhi sarva tyacyacakade paratavile jala

Kaya mi tyala soduna asanna upasya banavu ki jara (allaha) dayavana (rahamana) mala ekhade nukasana pohacavu icchila tara tyanci sipharasa mala kahica phayada pohacavu sakanara nahi ani na te mala vacavu sakatila
Maga tara mi niscitaca ughada margabhrastateta ahe
Majhe mhanane aika! Mi tara (sapha manane) tumha sarvancya palanakartyavara imana rakhale ahe
(Tyala) sangitale gele ki jannatamadhye dakhala ho. To mhanala, majhya janasamuhanehi januna ghetale asate tara bare jhale asate
Ki mala majhya palanakartyane mapha kele ani mala pratisthita lokammadhye samila kele
Ani tyanantara amhi tyacya janasamuhavara akasatuna ekhade sain'ya avatarita kele nahi ani na asa prakare amhi avatarita karato
To tara kevala eka bhayankara citkara hota, jyamule te sarvacya sarva vijhuna gele
(Asa) dasambaddala kheda! Kadhihi asa konatahi rasula (paigambara) tyancyajavala ala nahi, jyaci tyanni thatta udavili nasela
Kaya tyanni nahi pahile ki tyancyapurvi kityeka janasamuhanna amhi nasta karuna takale ki te yancyakade paratanara nahita
Pratyeka janasamuha ekatrita ho'una amacya samora hajara kela ja'ila
Ani tyancyasathi eka nisani mrta (koradi) jamina ahe jila amhi jivanta kele ani ticyatuna anna (dhan'ya) kadhale jyatuna te khatata
Ani amhi ticyata khajuricya ani draksancya baga nirmana kelya ani jyancyata jhare dekhila pravahita kele
Yasathi ki (lokanni) tici phale khavita ani tyancya hatanni te banavile nahi, maga te krtajnata ka nahi vyakta karita

To (allaha) motha pavitra ahe, jyane pratyeka vastucya jodya nirmana kelya, maga tya jaminituna ugavilelya vastu asota, kinva yance svatahce (astitva) aso, maga tya (vastu) asota, jyanna he janatahi nahita
Ani tyancyasathi eka nisani ratra ahe, jicyatuna amhi divasala odhuna gheto, tevha te acanaka andharata rahatata
Ani suryakarita je nirdharita marga aheta, to tyavaraca calata rahato.1 He ahe nirdharita kelele jabaradasta jnani (allaha) ce
Ani candracya amhi majali nirdharita kelelya aheta. Yetheparyanta ki to punasca jun'ya phandisarakha hoto
Na suryacya avakyata ahe ki candrala ja'una dharave ani na ratra, divasacya pudhe janari ahe ani sarvacya sarva akasata tarangata phiratata
Ani tyancyasathi eka nisani (hi dekhila) ahe ki amhi tyancya santatila bharalelya nauketa svara kele
Ani yancyasathi tyasarakhyaca itara vastu nirmana kelya, jyancyavara te svara hotata
Ani jara amhi icchile asate tara tyanna budavuna takale asate, maga na koni tyanci madata karanara asata ani na te vacavale gele asate
Parantu amhi apalyatarphe daya - krpa karato ani eka tharavika mudatiparyanta tyanna labha deta ahota
Ani tyanna jevha (kadhi) sangitale jate ki pudhacya - magacya (duskarmam) pasuna alipta raha, yasathi ki tumacyavara daya keli javi
Ani tyancyajavala tyancya palanakartyakaduna asi ekhadi nisani yeta nahi jicyapasuna he tonda phiravita nasaveta

Ani tyanna jevha sangitale jate ki allahane je dile ahe, tyatuna kahi kharca kara, tevha he kaphira, imana rakhanaryanna uttara detata ki amhi tyanna ka kha'u ghalave, jyanna allahane icchile asate tara svatahca kha'u - pi'u ghatale asate? Tumhi tara ahataca ughada margabhrastateta
Ani te mhanatata, ha vayada (kayamataci dhamaki) kevha purna ho'ila, sacce asala tara sanga
Tyanna kevala eka bhayankara citkaraci pratiksa ahe, jo tyanna ye'una dharela ani he apasata ladhata - bhandataca asatila
Tyaveli he na vasiyata (mrtyupatra) karu sakatila ani na - apalya kutumbakade paratu sakatila
Ani sura (sankha) phunkala jataca sarvacya sarva apalya kabarimadhuna apalya palanakartyakade (jalada gatine) calu lagatila
Mhanatila, arere! Amhala amacya aramacya jagetuna koni uthavile? Heca ahe te, jyaca vayada rahamana (dayavana) ne kela hota, ani paigambaranni khare khare sangitale hote
Ase navhe, parantu eka bhayankara garjana ki acanaka sarvacya sarva jama ho'una amacya samora hajara kele jatila
Tevha aja konatyahi manasavara kincitahi atyacara kela janara nahi ani tumhala tyaca karmanca mobadala dila ja'ila, je tumhi karita hote
Nihsansaya, jannatavale loka ajacya divasi apalya (manoranjana) karyata vyasta ani anandita aheta
Te ani tyancya patn'ya savalita asananvara takke lavuna basale asatila
Tyancyakarita jannatamadhye pratyeka prakarace meve asatila, ani itarahi, je kahi te magatila
Daya karanarya palanakartyatarphe tyanna â€˜salamaâ€™ mhatale ja'ila
Ani he aparadhyanno! Aja tumhi vegale vha
He adamaci santati! Kaya mi tumacyakaduna vacana navhate ghetale ki tumhi saitanaci upasana na karavi. To tara tumaca ughada satru ahe
Ani phakta majhica upasana karavi. Haca sarala marga ahe
Ani saitanane tara tumacyapaiki adhikansa samuhanna margabhrasta kele ahe. Kaya tumhi akkala nahi balagata
Hica ti jahannama ahe, jica vayada tumhala dila jata hota
Apalya kupra (inkara) ca mobadala prapta karanyakarita aja ticyata dakhala vha
Amhi aja tyancya tondavara mohara lavuna de'u ani tyance hata amacyasi bolatila ani tyance paya saksa detila, tyancya tya karmanci, je te karita hote
Ani amhi icchile asate tara tyance dole andhale karuna takale asate, maga he margakade dhavata gele asate, maga tyanna kasa prakare disuna ale asate
Ani amhi icchile asate tara tyancya jagevaraca tyance cehare bighadavuna (vikrta karuna) takale asate. Maga na te hindu phiru sakale asate ani na paratu sakale asate
Ani amhi jyala vrd'dha karato, tyala janmacya velecya avasthekade dusaryanda paratavito, maga kaya he tarihi samajuna gheta nahi
Ani na tara amhi ya paigambarasa kavya (kavita) sikavile, ani na ha tyasa yogya ahe. Ha tara kevala bodha upadesa ani spasta kura'ana ahe
Yasathi ki tyane pratyeka manasala savadha karave, jo jivanta ahe ani satya (pramana) prasthapita vhave
Kaya te nahi pahata ki amhi apalya hatanni banavilelya vastumpaiki, tyacyasathi catuspada (gure-dhore) hi nirmana kele jyance he malaka banale aheta
Ani tyam (pasum) na amhi tyancya adhina kele ahe, jyancyapaiki kahi tara tyanci vahane aheta ani kahim (ce mansa) khatata
Ani tyanna tyancyapasuna itarahi aneka phayade aheta, ani pinyacya vastu kaya tarihi he krtajnata darsavita nahi
Ani te allahakherija dusaryannahi upasya banavitata (ya asene) ki tyanci madata keli javi
(Vastavika) tyanna madata karanyace te samarthya balagata nahita, tathapi he (anekesvaravadi) tyance sain'ya ya natyane hajara aheta
Yastava tyancya gosti (bolanya) ne duhkhi kasti na vhave amhi tyancya lapalelya va ughada sarvaca gostinna (cangalya prakare) janato
Kaya manasala evadhehi mahita nahi ki amhi tyala viryapasuna nirmana kele ahe, tarihi to ughada bhandakhora banuna basala
Ani tyane amacyasathi udaharane sangitali ani apalya (mula) utpattila visarala, mhanala ki ya sadalya kujalya hadanna kona (punha) jivanta karu sakato
Sanga ki tyanna to jivanta karila, jyane tyanna pahilyanda nirmana kele, jo sarva prakaraci utpatti cangalya prakare jananara ahe
Toca hoya, jyane tumacyasathi hiravya vrksapasuna aga nirmana keli, jyadvare tumhi aga prajvalita karata
Jyane akasanna ani dharatila nirmana kele ahe, kaya to yancyasarakhyanna nirmana karanyasa samartha nahi? Niscitaca samartha ahe ani toca nirmana karanara, jananara ahe
Jevha to ekhadya gostica irada karato, tevha tyace evadhe mhanane (purese) ahe ki ghaduna ye, ti gosta tatkala ghaduna yete
Motha pavitra ahe to allaha, jyacya hati pratyeka gostica sattadhikara ahe ani jyacyakade tumhi sarva paratavile jala
